title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to cancel adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, the cancel operation does not have any effect.
EB: When clicking the cancel button in the progress dialog while adding an exception breakpoint, the operation should be aborted and the breakpoint should not be added.
SR: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog, click cancel to abort the breakpoint addition process.
